channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fridge freezer dumped, 24th October
item.description:
Fridge freezer dumped next to recycling point in Avenue Road car park, Bexleyheath. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blackthorn Grove, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Zebra crossing beacon cover, 24th October
item.description:
One of the covers over the zebra crossing beacons has moved round after the recent strong winds, meaning the beacon is now flashing directly into the bedrooms at night. Could this be rectified, thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brampton Road, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pieces of dismantled furniture left by bin area, 24th October
item.description:
Several large pieces of dismantled furniture have been left by the bin area. Action needed to remove. The bin area is located on Purbrook estate, on the corner of Riley Road. Opposite no. 88.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Purbrook Street, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Furniture and waste, 24th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakmere Road, Plumstead, London

item.title: Aggressive parking warden, 24th October
item.description:
The parking warden on duty at 11am on Thursday 23rd October was incredibly aggressive in telling me to move my car. I had just finished feeding my 8 month old baby. He told me he didnâ€™t care and that I was costing the council money. He then started telling another motorist how out of line I was. It was very intimidating.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Coleherne Road, Earl's Court, London
Report on FixMyStreet
